00031 
00032 // used by RamStorageMapper
00033 const UINT16 c_ram_storage_default_block_size = APOXI_RAM_STORAGE_DEFAULT_BLOCK_SIZE;
00034 
00035 enum RamError {
00036 // FS error codes:
00037     RamErrorSuccess                 = 0,
00038     RamErrorOperationNotPossible    = 3,
00039 
00040 /* File system errno values */
00041     RamErrorNotExist                = 2,  /* File not found or path to file not found. */
00042     RamErrorBadFileDescriptor       = 9,  /* Invalid file descriptor. */
00043     RamErrorFileAlreadyExist        = 17, /* Exclusive access requested but file already exists. */
00044     RamErrorAccessDenied            = 13, /* Attempt to open a read only file or a special directory. */
00045     RamErrorNegativeFilePointer     = 22, /* Seek to negative file pointer attempted. */
00046     RamErrorNoSpace                 = 28, /* Write failed. Presumably because of no space. */
00047     RamErrorShare                   = 30  /* Open failed due to sharing. */
00048 };
00049 
00050 /* Open file modes */
00051 enum RamOpenMode {
00052     RamOpenModeRead         = 0x0000200,
00053     RamOpenModeWrite        = 0x0000400
00054 };
00055 
00056 /* File info type */
00057 struct RamFileInfo {
00058     UINT32          st_size;        /* file size, in bytes */
00059     INT32           st_blksize;     /* optimal block size for I/O (cluster size) */
00060     INT32           st_blocks;      /* blocks allocated for file */
00061     Date            st_atime;       /* last access (all times are the same) */
00062     Date            st_mtime;       /* last modification */
00063     Date            st_ctime;       /* last file status change */
00064     UINT16          fattribute;     /* file attributes - DOS attributes
00065                                        (non standard but useful) */
00066     UINT16          padding;
00067 };
00068 
00069 enum RamFileAttribute {
00070     RamFileAttrRdOnly       = 0x01,
00071     RamFileAttrHidden       = 0x02,
00072     RamFileAttrSystem       = 0x04,
00073     RamFileAttrVolume       = 0x08,
00074     RamFileAttrDirectory    = 0x10,
00075     RamFileAttrArchive      = 0x20,
00076     RamFileAttrNormal       = 0x40,
00077     RamFileAttrAll          = 0xFF
00078 };
00079 
00080 /*
00081     Defines a structure which represents a certain block index and the number of used bytes.
00082 
00083     e.g. block_size = 16;
00084     [x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x]
00085     byte_count = 0
00086 
00087     [a|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x]
00088     byte_count = 1
00089 
00090     [a|b|c|d|e|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x]
00091     byte_count = 5
00092 
00093     [a|b|c|d|e|f|g|h|i|j|k|l|m|n|o|p]
00094     byte_count = 16
00095 */
00096 struct RamBlockData {
00097     UINT32 block_index; // index of block in ram storage
00098     UINT32 used_bytes;  // number of bytes used in this block
00099 };
